languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, прямо по курсу следы недавней заварушки... Ох, Трон подери, да это не имперский фрегат, а просто выпотрошенный кусок металла!" {n}Кормчий на секунду затихает.{/n} "Чтоб меня, а ведь виновнички происшествия тоже здесь — эльдарские выродки! Узнаю их сияющие задницы даже с такого расстояния. Только... ведут себя ксеносы подозрительно — зависли на месте и даже не думают давать деру. Подлететь ближе, или прикажете атаковать издалека?"

"Lord Cap'n, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not a frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a moment.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognise their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to run. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, прямо по курсу следы недавней заварушки... Ох, Трон подери, да это не имперский фрегат, а просто выпотрошенный кусок металла!" {n}Кормчий на секунду затихает.{/n} "Чтоб меня, а ведь виновнички происшествия тоже здесь — эльдарские выродки! Узнаю их сияющие задницы даже с такого расстояния. Только... ведут себя ксеносы подозрительно — зависли на месте и даже не думают давать деру. Подлететь ближе, или прикажете атаковать издалека?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not an imperial frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a short while.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognize their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to vamoose. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"

"Lord Captain, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not an imperial frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a short while.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognize their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to vamoose. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"

"Lord Cap'n, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not a frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a moment.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognise their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to run. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"

languages.text: “船长老大，咱们前往这片星域不久之前发生过一场混战……黄金王座在上，这根本算不上护卫舰！简直就是一块被掏空了的铁块！”{n}舵手长沉默了片刻。{/n}“我的天，罪魁祸首也在这个地方，是那些艾达灵族怪物！哪怕离得这么远，我也能一眼看出他们亮闪闪的屁股。不过……这些异形的行为很可疑。它们一直在原地打转，甚至连逃都不逃。咱们应该就这么过去，还是直接从远处开火？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not a frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a moment.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognise their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to run. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，咱们前往这片星域不久之前发生过一场混战……黄金王座在上，这根本算不上护卫舰！简直就是一块被掏空了的铁块！”{n}舵手长沉默了片刻。{/n}“我的天，罪魁祸首也在这个地方，是那些艾达灵族怪物！哪怕离得这么远，我也能一眼看出他们亮闪闪的屁股。不过……这些异形的行为很可疑。它们一直在原地打转，甚至连逃都不逃。咱们应该就这么过去，还是直接从远处开火？”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous détectons des traces d'un affrontement récent, droit devant... Que le Trône m'emporte, ça n'a plus rien d'une frégate, c'est juste un tas de ferraille éventré ! » {n}Le maître timonier se tait un instant.{/n} « Bon sang, les coupables sont encore dans le coin. Ces saloperies d'Aeldaris ! Je reconnaîtrais leurs culs brillants entre mille. Sauf que... ces xénos se comportent bizarrement. Ils sont en vol stationnaire et ne cherchent même pas à s'enfuir. Qu'est-ce qu'on fait ? On s'approche ou on leur tire dessus d'ici ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not a frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a moment.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognise their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to run. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous détectons des traces d'un affrontement récent, droit devant... Par le Trône m'emporte, ça n'a plus rien d'une frégate, c'est juste un tas de ferraille éventré ! » {n}Le maître timonier se tait un instant.{/n} « Bon sang, les coupables sont encore dans le coin. Ces saloperies d'Aeldaris ! Je reconnaîtrais leurs culs brillants entre mille. Sauf que... ces xénos se comportent bizarrement. Ils sont en vol stationnaire et ne cherchent même pas à s'enfuir. Qu'est-ce qu'on fait ? On s'approche ou on leur tire dessus d'ici ? »

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, es ist nicht lange her, dass vor uns ein Kampf ausgetragen wurde ... Der Thron hole mich, das ist keine Fregatte, sondern ein ausgeschlachtetes Stück Metall!" {n}Der Steuermann schweigt einen Augenblick.{/n} "Mann, auch die Täter sind hier, diese Aeldari-Freaks! Selbst von hier erkenne ich ihre glänzenden Ärsche. Aber ... die Xenos verhalten sich sehr verdächtig, sie fliegen an Ort und Stelle und machen kein Anzeichen, sich zurückzuziehen. Sollen wir uns nähern oder aus der Distanz das Feuer eröffnen?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Der Thron hole mich, das ist keine imperiale Fregatte, sondern ein ausgeschlachtetes Stück Metall!" {n}Der Steuermann schweigt einen Augenblick.{/n} "Mann, auch die Täter sind hier, diese Aeldari-Freaks! Selbst von hier erkenne ich ihre glänzenden Ärsche. Aber ... die Xenos verhalten sich sehr verdächtig, sie fliegen an Ort und Stelle und machen kein Anzeichen, sich zurückzuziehen. Sollen wir uns nähern oder aus der Distant das Feuer eröffnen?"

"Lord Captain, es ist nicht lange her, dass vor uns ein Kampf ausgetragen wurde ... Der Thron hole mich, das ist keine imperiale Fregatte, sondern ein ausgeschlachtetes Stück Metall!" {n}Der Steuermann schweigt einen Augenblick.{/n} "Mann, auch die Täter sind hier, diese Aeldari-Freaks! Selbst von hier erkenne ich ihre glänzenden Ärsche. Aber ... die Xenos verhalten sich sehr verdächtig, sie fliegen an Ort und Stelle und machen kein Anzeichen, sich zurückzuziehen. Sollen wir uns nähern oder aus der Distant das Feuer eröffnen?"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, tenemos pruebas de una escaramuza reciente en la zona que tenemos delante... Por el Trono, eso no es una fragata imperial, ¡es un amasijo de metal eviscerado!». {n}El maestro timonel permanece en silencio unos instantes.{/n} «También están los culpables, ¡son esos lunáticos Aeldari! Reconocería sus culos lustrosos desde lejos. Aunque... estos xenos actúan de una forma un tanto sospechosa: están peinando la zona y no parece que se dispongan a huir. ¿Deberíamos acercarnos o dispararles desde lejos?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not a frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a moment.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognise their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to run. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, tenemos pruebas de una escaramuza reciente en la zona que tenemos delante... Por el Trono, eso no es una fragata imperial, ¡es un amasijo de metal eviscerado!». {n}El maestro timonel permanece en silencio unos instantes.{/n} «También están los culpables, ¡son esos lunáticos Aeldari! Reconocería sus culos lustrosos desde lejos. Aunque... estos xenos actúan de una forma un tanto sospechosa: están peinando la zona y no parece que se dispongan a huir. ¿Deberíamos acercarnos o dispararles desde lejos?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この先に最近の小競り合いの痕跡があります…王座よ、これはフリゲート艦ではなくて、ただの金属の残骸です！」{n}操舵士は一瞬黙り込む。{/n}「まったく、犯人もまだいます。アエルダリのイカれた連中です！この距離からでも、奴らのピカピカのケツが見分けられますよ。ただ…異種族たちの様子が妙です。その場でホバリングしていて、逃げようともしない。近づきますか？それとも距離を取って砲撃します？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not a frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a moment.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognise their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to run. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この先に最近の小競り合いの痕跡があります…王座よ、これはフリゲート艦ではなくて、ただの金属の残骸です！」{n}操舵士は一瞬黙り込む。{/n}「まったく、犯人もまだいます。アエルダリのイカれた連中です！この距離からでも、奴らのピカピカのケツが見分けられますよ。ただ…異種族たちの様子が妙です。その場でホバリングしていて、逃げようともしない。近づきますか？それとも距離を取って砲撃します？」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, hemen ileride taze bir çatışmanın izleri var... Taht canımı ala, fırkateyn değil bu. Paramparça bir metal yığını!" {n}Serdümen bir müddet susuyor.{/n} "Bak hele, müsebbipleri de burada. Ucube Aeldariler! Parlayan kıçlarını ta buradan seçebiliyorum. Ama... Zenolar bir tuhaf davranıyor. Oldukları yerde duruyor, kaçmaya çalışmıyorlar bile. Yaklaşmamızı mı yoksa uzaktan ateş mi açmamızı istersiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, there is evidence of a recent scuffle straight ahead of us... Throne take me, this is not a frigate, this is just a gutted piece of metal!" {n}The helmsman falls silent for a moment.{/n} "Blimey, the culprits are here too, it is the Aeldari freaks! I recognise their shiny asses even from this distance. Except... the xenos are acting suspiciously, they are hovering in place and not even trying to run. Should we approach or open fire from a distance?"
